name: TigerShroff
description: This Bot Will Help You To Store Files In Cloud Storage. You Can Add Files To The Bot By Forward the last file from a public channel to your bot and Press Yes Button.. If The Files Channl Is Private Make the bot admin on the channel and forward the last file to bot. Then Add the bot to you group and send the movie name The Bot Will Give the file in Bot PM..✮✮

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures .

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs,Give a channel id with -100xxxxxxx

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your postgres sql db, empty this field if you dont have one.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Username of a Support Group / ADMIN. ( Should be username without @ and not ID)

OWNER_ID.description: Add Your TG Id Required For Group Management Features.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Required For Group Management and without @. eg:tigershroffimdbot.

SUDO_USERS.description: needed some trusted friends for using group features or add your own id.

SUPPORT_STAFF.description: if You are a coder add your id or I'll add mine

AUTH_USERS.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

USE_CAPTION_FILTER.description: Whether bot should use captions to improve search results. (True False)

CUSTOM_FILE_CAPTION.description: A custom file caption for your files. formatable with , file_name, file_caption, file_size, Read Readme.md for better understanding.

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in mongoDB.

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot

CACHE_TIME.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the result of the inline query may be cached on the server

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as support users(gban perms only).

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as whitelisted - can't be banned with your bot.

IMDB.description: Imdb, the view of information when making True/False

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Your Telegram support group chat username where user's can contact in case of a problem..

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Event logs channel where bot will send updates.

SINGLE_BUTTON.description: choose b/w single or double buttons https://github.com/Aadhi000/Ajax/issues/22

P_TTI_SHOW_OFF.description: Customize Result Buttons to Callback or Url by (True = url / False = callback)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: For Heroku Status in Bot Use /status
